body_content.explanation: the act of changing what you think the meaning of something is, or an example of this:
examples: This is a drastic reinterpretation that the Constitution's original drafters neither contemplated nor intended.
The reinterpretation of the no-fly rules follows a study of the legal position commissioned five months ago.

body_content.explanation: the act of performing a play, piece of music, etc. in a way that expresses your own new ideas about it, or of creating something again using new ideas:
examples: He has a very personal approach to the reinterpretation of the dramatist's work.
It is an excellent re-interpretation of a classic musical, which stayed true to its original whilst still offering some new relevance to the performance.
